pageContext.claim: “If Iran is able to turn over to the U.S. kidnapped former FBI Agent Robert A. Levinson, who has been missing in Iran for 12 years, it would be a very positive step. At the same time, upon information & belief, Iran is, & has been, enriching uranium. THAT WOULD BE A VERY BAD STEP!”
pageContext.analysis: This is an odd tweet, because there has sadly been no proof of life for Levinson in years, and Iran has said publicly that it is enriching uranium.
